definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The young boxer has copped the prize of the first round.
sentences.chinese: 这位年轻的拳击手已获得了第一回合的胜利。

sentences.english: Most boxers can fight only five rounds because this kind of fighting is very difficult.
sentences.chinese: 大多数拳击手只能打五轮，因为这种拼斗非常困难。

sentences.english: The boxer feinted with his right hand and struck with his left hand.
sentences.chinese: 这个拳击手用右手佯攻而出左手击打。

sentences.english: Because of this,they were known as'prizefighters.'
sentences.chinese: 因此，他们被称作“博奖拳击手”。

sentences.english: Yang Sigeng is a boxer indeed!
Spider kelly taught them to box like featherweights .
sentences.chinese: 斯拜德凯利教他们像次轻量级拳击手那样去打拳。

sentences.english: The other boxer put Jim out in the third round.
sentences.chinese: 第三个回合拳击手将吉姆打昏了。

sentences.english: The boxer weighs three hundred pounds and walks like a veritable colossus.
sentences.chinese: 这个拳击手重三百镑，走起路来像个十足的巨人。

sentences.english: The boxer whaled his rival 3 to 0.
sentences.chinese: 拳击手以3比0击败了对手。

sentences.english: Mia is an American professional boxer and Tae Kwon Do champion.
sentences.chinese: 米亚是美国职业拳击手，也是跆拳道冠军。

sentences.english: The fighter neatly fenced off a dangerous blow.
sentences.chinese: 这位拳击手灵巧地挡开了十分危险的一击。

sentences.english: The boxer was whaling away at his opponent with both fists.
sentences.chinese: 那位拳击手挥舞双拳，向他的对手击去。

sentences.english: The boxer KOed five in a row.
sentences.chinese: 拳击手一连击倒了五个对手。
那拳击手的下巴松了下来。

sentences.english: A few boxers to boiled chicken money let Bai Yaozu prepared with a boxer.
sentences.chinese: 几个拳击手给白斩鸡钱让白耀祖与一名拳击手对练。

sentences.english: A few boxers to boiled chicken money let Bai Yaozu prepared with a boxer.
sentences.chinese: 几个拳击手给白斩鸡钱让白耀祖与一名拳击手对练。

definition: to fight, esp. with hands/wrestling (as a sport)/to wrestle/to wrestle (against fate, with a problem etc)/to capture prey
(Internet slang) to mouth off/to shoot one's mouth off/sb who does that
Bruce Lee (1940-1973), Hong Kong actor and martial arts expert
Arnold Schwarzenegger (1947-), US actor and politician, governor of California 2003-2011
